CustomField.formula:
IF(
OR( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Inactive")), IMAGE("http://i346.photobucket.com/albums/p420/Alexwaddell47/red_zpsstmdfrrt.png","red",14,14),
IF(
AND(
ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Active")) , IMAGE("http://i346.photobucket.com/albums/p420/Alexwaddell47/120px-Green_sphere_zpsvi7byqdp.png", "Green", 16, 16), NULL
))
CustomField.label: Active / Inactive
